concept.title: Installments for Subscription Plans
concept.abstract: When allowing members to pay for a subscription in installments, the System Admin must check the Enable Schedule field, set the Schedule Type to Invoice, define the Schedule Frequency, and enter the Number of Installments on the Subscription Plan record.
